title: FS  Old Judge Hanging Ad Piece - 1885 - Goodwin and Co.
author: Leon

posts.post_title: FS  Old Judge Hanging Ad Piece - 1885 - Goodwin and Co.
posts.post_content:
Title says it all....

There is a hole near the top to hang it from.....approximately 8 x 11 inches...not counting the large border, which has been mostly cut off in the scan. It's all there on all sides though. The borders are about 1.5 inches all the way around it. Would look great with or without a frame.  $765 delivered

[IMG]https://luckeycards.com/pphoto1888oldjudgeprint5.jpg[/IMG]

Cool piece

You have amazing stuff

GLWS
